evidence.text:
SISTER AGNES: She is safe with me, Your Eminence. I am dealing with the situation.
LAWRENCE: I am sure you are Sister Agnes. But I must see her myself.
SISTER AGNES: I hardly think a dropped tray should concern the Dean of the College of Cardinals
SISTER AGNES: The welfare of the Sister is my responsibility, Dean.
LAWRENCE: And this Conclave is mine. Beat.
LAWRENCE: Please, sit, my child. My name is Cardinal Lawrence. How are you feeling?
